alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Haralson; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Haralson, southeastern Floyd and Polk Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Cedartown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rome, Cedartown, Rockmart, Aragon, Cave Spring, Seney, Fish Creek, Felton, Lindale, Eubank Lake, Antioch, and Van Wert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
